entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 06:25 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: N 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
